title.narrative: Model Graduates Initiative for Education and Training(MGIET)

description.narrative: Vision To be a leading Development Organization that aspires to see indispensable and efficient Scholars who greatly contribute to development goals of Ethiopia. Mission Provide quality education and problem solving training by taking initiative towards using potentials of graduates to the merits of the country and the people Objectives To do capacity building works in education and training; To make and assist research to realize accessibility, practicality and quality of education and training; To do capacity building works which helps for overall development; To offer assistance, advise and scholarships for students; To provide tutorials and special education for the needy; To develop standard training curriculum and modules; To build Schools, Institutes and Training Centers; To give long and short term training which strength capacities of students; To provide need based training and education for adults and community members who needs special assistance. To do awareness creation of the society for increase of participation in education. Areas of Intervention Education Promoting girls education Local scholarship for higher education School construction Adult education Community awareness creation on importance of education School water, sanitation and hygiene School health and nutrition School environment and food security School equipment and furniture supply Tutorial services Training Training curriculum and Modules preparation Training delivery for: School teachers University lecturers School student (from grade 9 to 12) University students First year students Graduating class students Youth associations Volunteers Research Overall performance of education Challenges on girls education Quality of education
